ResourceHeader.Description: Hinode Science Center at Nagoya (HSC@Nagoya) have been operated jointly by Institute for Space-Earth Environmental Research (ISEE), Nagoya University and Hinode Science Project, National Astronomical Observatory of Japan (NOAJ). This new center is built as the back-up site of the Hinode Science Center at NAOJ (HSC@NAOJ) and also as a leading site for developing a new research field in terms of Hinode and the database developed by ISEE.
